name: TicTacToe - Zoomer Edition
description:
Player’s take turns either using a Zoom reaction or waiting until someone screenshots three matching reactions in a line.

  • Player order randomized (oldest to youngest, or through a randomize app)
  • Players either use a reaction, wait, or a combo of both
  • First to post a screenshot of three matching reactions in a line wins (has to be horizontal or vertical, thus no diagonals and no bending the line)

Advanced tactics to maximize your chance for a 3 in a row:

  • alternating between speaker view and gallery view
  • pinning specific people
  • stretching/shrinking the Zoom window to reorder the groups
  • using the Zoom triangle arrows to shift people around

Good luck, have fun!
